metadata.name: 0xbbq
metadata.description:
3412x4033px jpg

At a 0xbbq, instead of traditional barbecue sauce, the grill master uses a special blockchain-connected sauce mixer that automatically adjusts its flavor based on the preferences of each individual guest, as determined by their digital identity. Additionally, guests can pay for their food using various cryptocurrencies, with the prices automatically adjusted in real-time. The party also features a virtual reality experience that allows attendees to explore a decentralized digital world while having a chat or enjoying their grilled delicacies.
